EmailTemplate.name: 201902_Americas_Email_DU-875_Upgrade_MC.201902_Americas_Pentastar_DU875_Email4_k
EmailTemplate.subject: Act Now: Limited Time DU-875 Trade-In Credit Ends Soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.pentastaraviation.com/]]>
Avoid obsolescence. Receive a $35,000 trade-in credit per display unit (no limit) plus special Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) incentives when you update your CRT DU-870 to a DU-875 LCD display with Pentastar Aviation, a Honeywell Authorized Avionics Dealer.
The DU-875 display upgrade is a form-fit, plug-n-play upgrade that offers increased reliability, reduced cost of ownership, reduced weight that translates to fuel savings and a growth plan that takes advantage of future technologies and applications. Score all of these benefits without changing the existing wiring or requiring additional pilot training.
Act now! The DU-870 to DU-875 trade-in credit is only available through June 30, 2019.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/DU-875_Upgrade_Pentastar.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_pentastar_du875]]>
